JobTitle: Data Engineer Jobs in USA, NC, Raleigh | Rose International Job
JobDescription: ***Only qualified Data Engineer candidates located in the Raleigh, NC area to be considered due to the position requiring an onsite presence***Required Education:• BS/BA degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Computer Engineering; MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent or an MBAPreferred Certification:• MS Azure or MS Cloud certification Required Skills:• Database Design (10 Years) • SQL Server, DB2 experience (10 Years)• Database back up, maintaining table partitions (5 Years)• Database Conversion, Cleansing, Migration (10 Years)• Application development or application support or application testing or a combination of those experiences (10 Years)• Software development lifecycle methodologies (10 Years)• Ability to create and maintain required documentation. This includes documenting customer requirements, design flows and systems flow (10 Years)• Leading or Supervising an IT Team (5 Years)• Written and verbal communications are clear, concise and achieve intended objectives (10 Years)• Problem Diagnosis skills [i.e., discovery, replication, troubleshooting, resolution, verification, communication and/or escalation as required] (10 Years)• Experience with writing test cases, executing those cases and leading technical training (10 Years)• Must reside in North Carolina and can report on-site at short noticeDesired Skills:• SQL Server SSIS management and/or framework • Parquet text maintenance knowledge The Sr. Data Solutions Engineer role will aid in the development of a new cloud environment by assisting the client's Modernization Team with the design, management, and maintenance of data flow as it pertains to cloud technology. Additionally, this role will also be responsible for data analysis, data profiling, data cleansing, data governance, in preparation for data conversion of the existing environment. The ideal candidate will be able to develop & maintain cloud data strategy, evaluate data elements and structure, and ensure the smooth integration of data internal and external to cloud initiativesJob Responsibilities:• Lead the design of data conversion, cleansing, migration, and frameworks while ensuring security and data integrity• Design and enforce policies based on Data Quality, Data Security, Data retention, Data Stewardship• Document the data model & data mapping, create a data dictionary, define columns and data relationships• Maintain the end-to-end vision of the data flow diagram and develop logical data models into physical data repositories• Use data cleansing & governance tools to administer, manage and script database functions based on user inputs and data quality principles• Design and deliver Data integration solutions based on current DB2 and future Microsoft SQL Server systems• Identify project impacts on Business Process Models for our business stakeholders as it relates to Software Development Lifecycle methodology• Coordinate with all other solution architects to assist the Enterprise Services Team with the delivery of software solutions• Execution of cloud design and implementation strategies• Evaluation and selection of the appropriate data frameworks• Establishment of standards, best practices for data conversion, data mapping, data cleansing, and data migration as it evolves from legacy to cloud-based technologies• Design of system integration containing database permissions, keys, and access for authorized data usage and reporting• Process Instruction of infrastructure movement techniques and data transfers using multiple ETL/ELT sources• Responding to technical issues timely and effectively• Leading and solicit database programmers, application teams, security, and infrastructure teams to monitor cloud privacy, performance, and load• Capturing lessons learned and transitional knowledge to assist the Leadership Team in establishing a mentoring path that provides technical exposure and develops the next generation of client leaders and technical staff**Only those lawfully authorized to work in the designated country associated with the position will be considered.** **Please note that all Position start dates and duration are estimates and may be reduced or lengthened based upon a client’s business needs and requirements.**
Reasoning: The role of Sr. Data Solutions Engineer is heavily IT-focused, involving cloud environment development, data management, and application integration, which aligns with an IT services division.
